xml.STR: <1>Log in to SN ( Users / customer - Hilton Corporate/ Level - Admin / Permission - Chain / Report Type - Main)</1> <2>Go to Dashboard</2> <3>Select "DIRECT"</3> <4>Select "Priceline" in "Channel" filter</4> <5>See snapshot below https://prnt.sc/voHYe0xsZvJ6</5> The rate for members was extracted. The price was extracted correctly for public rate.
